caption:
Golden Waterfront Grandeur at 631 Hibiscus Drive ✨ | Offered at: $6,999,000
​
Nestled in the exclusive gated community of Golden Isles, this meticulously crafted waterfront masterpiece boasts 6 bedrooms and 7.5 lavishly appointed bathrooms. Revel in the luxury of a state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen. Adorned with marble and wood floors, the grandeur of this residence begins upon your first step inside the foyer entrance that extends to the spacious living room, formal dining room, family room, and inviting bar and breakfast area. Ascend the heights of luxury with the convenience of an elevator, a 3-car garage, and three magnificent terraces. Enveloped in exclusivity, a private dock awaits with 85 feet of water frontage, ready to accommodate a large yacht, ensuring a lifestyle of unparalleled refinement and sophistication.
​
📍 Hallandale Beach, FL
🛏️ 6 Bedrooms
🛁 7 Bathrooms | 1 Half Bathroom
📐 5,829 Square Feet
🌊 85 Feet of Water Frontage
